name: Basketball Madness
description:
Let the Basketball Madness begin!

If you are into street basketball and you love to have fun for hours, be a part of this arcade challenge. But you are not alone at the court you can also have an opponent of your choice.

Experience classic basketball arcade game

Featuring realistic physics, it’s a classic basketball arcade experience we all know. Fight against the clock to score as much points as you can

Don’t want to be alone? Enjoy a 1v1 mode!

if you like 1v1 basketball, this mode will be your favorite! Fight against an AI opponent! Choose the difficulty level and start the competition. You can even find ways to deflect his shots, or hit him directly with a special ball to freeze him for some time.

Expand your reality with fun mode

it expands on the standard mode with power-ups. They are crystals you can find near the hoop. Try to hit them on your way to make a score and you will have some benefits with most of them. They can:

transform the ball into grumpy pizza, banana, or carrot
Make the ball smaller or bigger
increase or shorten the game time
Make the hoop smaller or bigger
Make the ball sticky
Offset the ball

Test your skills on the court

If you want to feel the real basketball court, try the court mode and aim for the hoop progressively changing the positions. master the hoop from all the positions to get the highest score!

Aim higher!

Shoot at more hoops of different hight. The higher the hoops the higher the score. You will see that some hoops have hands that block you from scoring. The only way to disable them is to score on the smallest hoop.

Survive the attack

survive against and fight two enemies - the beaver that tries to crush the hoop and you need to fight against him with an arrow in flames; and a Stone Creature
Who attacks you with his stones. Use the bat to defend yourself from stones. And when he comes to destroy the hoop, you can use the crossbow to stop him. Survive as long as you can while scoring at the same time.



Become a part of this basketball arcade mania and enjoy the funniest virtual reality game in your life. No matter if you like to play freestyle basketball, any other kind of professional, or street basketball in the real world, the Basketball Madness arcade game will become your favorite in VR.
